name: Gluten-Free Tortillas
author: goodsaltmusic
summary: A great alternative to traditional corn or flour tortillas. They worked perfectly the first time, too. I use these as sandwich thins as well.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Stir almond four, coconut flour, eggs, oil, and salt together in a bowl
Divide dough into 8 evenly sized balls
Put one ball at a time between two sheets of parchment paper and press flat with a tortilla press or roll into a 6-inch circles using a rolling pin
Arrange tortillas on a baking sheet
Bake in preheated oven until lightly browned, 6 to 8 minutes
